scripts.build: pnpm --filter @foundation/shared build && pnpm --filter @foundation/db build && pnpm run build:services && pnpm run typecheck:workers
scripts.typecheck:workers: pnpm --filter foundation-gateway --filter foundation-agents --filter foundation-workflows --filter foundation-queues --filter foundation-cron --filter foundation-planning-machine run typecheck
scripts.setup: echo 'Run scripts/setup-d1.sh, setup-kv.sh, setup-r2.sh, setup-queues.sh then set secrets'
scripts.db:migrate: cd services/gateway && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply foundation-primary --remote
scripts.planning:setup: cd services/planning-machine && npx wrangler d1 create planning-primary 2>/dev/null || true && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply planning-primary --remote
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && wrangler dev --local --port 8788 -c services/ui/wrangler.jsonc -c services/gateway/wrangler.jsonc -c services/planning-machine/wrangler.jsonc -c services/workflows/wrangler.jsonc -c services/agents/wrangler.jsonc -c services/queues/wrangler.jsonc
scripts.dev:gateway: wrangler dev --local --port 8788 -c services/gateway/wrangler.jsonc -c services/planning-machine/wrangler.jsonc -c services/workflows/wrangler.jsonc -c services/agents/wrangler.jsonc -c services/queues/wrangler.jsonc
